title: Supported Leagues
custom_steps: When the user is navigating within the app and is viewing the leagues and teams
custom_expected:
Then team names should appear for the following leagues:

- International
- Pacific
- Eastern
- Southern
- Texas
- California
- Carolina
- Florida
- Midwest
- South Atlantic
- New York-Penn
- Northwest
- Appalachian
- Pioneer

The following Leagues are NOT supported:
- Arizona
- Dominican
- Gulf
- Mexican

http://www.milb.com/milb/info/teams.jsp
